title: Schopieray's Galois-modular extension conjecture
summary: Plavnik, Schopieray, Yu, and Zhang have drawn attention to those (automatically premodular) fusion subcategories of modular fusion categories which are submodules for the Galois action on the ambient category. In particular, they showed that a subcategory is a Galois submodule if and only if its centralizer is integral. In the other direction, Schopieray has conjectured that every premodular fusion category can be embedded as a Galois-closed subcategory of a modular category; Schopieray calls such an embedding a "Galois-modular extension." We prove Schopieray's conjecture for pseudounitary categories. Along the way we record some general comments about the minimal nondegenerate extension problem for braided fusion categories.

AI.tldr: 证明了Schopieray关于预模融合范畴可嵌入模融合范畴作为Galois闭子范畴的猜想，针对伪幺正范畴的情况。
AI.motivation: 研究模融合范畴中Galois作用下的子范畴结构，特别是预模融合范畴能否嵌入到模范畴中作为Galois闭子范畴的问题。
AI.method: 通过分析Galois作用下的子模结构，利用中心化子与积分性的关系，研究预模融合范畴嵌入模范畴的条件。
AI.result: 证明了Schopieray猜想对于伪幺正范畴成立，即每个伪幺正预模融合范畴都可以作为Galois闭子范畴嵌入到某个模融合范畴中。
AI.conclusion: 伪幺正预模融合范畴都存在Galois模扩张，这为理解预模范畴与模范畴之间的关系提供了重要理论支持。

title: Lifts of endomorphisms of Weyl algebras modulo $p^2$
summary: Let $\varphi$ denote a $k$-algebra endomorphism of the $n$-th Weyl algebra $A_n(k)$ over a perfect field $k$ of positive characteristic $p$. We prove that $\varphi$ can be lifted to an endomorphism of the Weyl algebra $A_n(W_2(k))$ over the Witt vectors $W_2(k)$ of length two over $k$ if and only if $\varphi$ induces a Poisson morphism of the center of $A_n(k)$. Furthermore, we improve a result of Tsuchimoto, which enables us to conclude that these equivalent statements hold at least when ${\rm deg}(\varphi) < p$. In particular, we conclude that $\varphi$ is injective if ${\rm deg}(\varphi) < p$.

AI.tldr: 研究正特征域上Weyl代数的自同态提升到Witt向量上Weyl代数的条件，证明当且仅当诱导中心Poisson同态时可提升，且当度数小于特征p时自动满足。
AI.motivation: 研究正特征域上Weyl代数的自同态何时可以提升到Witt向量上的Weyl代数，这关系到特征p几何中的提升问题和代数结构的保持。
AI.method: 使用Witt向量理论和Poisson几何方法，分析Weyl代数自同态与中心Poisson结构的关系，改进Tsuchimoto的结果。
AI.result: 证明自同态可提升到W_2(k)上当且仅当诱导中心Poisson同态；当度数小于特征p时这些等价条件自动成立，且此时自同态是单射。
AI.conclusion: 建立了正特征域上Weyl代数自同态提升的完整判据，将提升问题与Poisson结构联系起来，并给出了度数小于特征p时的充分条件。

title: Uniqueness of the non-commutative divergence cocycle
summary: We show that, for $n \geq 3 $, 1-cocycles of degree zero on the Lie algebra of derivations of the free associative algebra $T(A_n)$ with values in $ \rvert T(A_n) \rvert \otimes \rvert T(A_n) \rvert $ are linear combinations of the non-commutative divergence and its switch, when restricted to finite-degree quotients. Here, $ \rvert T(A_n) \rvert $ denotes the space of cyclic words. Furthermore, we study 1-cocycles of degree zero on the Lie algebra of symplectic derivations of the free Lie algebra $ \mathfrak{L_{2n}}$, and prove the uniqueness of the Enomoto-Satoh trace.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了自由结合代数T(A_n)的导子李代数上的1-上循环，证明当n≥3时，取值于循环词空间张量积的零次1-上循环在有限次商上的限制是非交换散度及其交换的线性组合。同时研究了自由李代数𝔏_{2n}的辛导子李代数上的1-上循环，证明了Enomoto-Satoh迹的唯一性。
AI.motivation: 研究自由结合代数和自由李代数的导子李代数上的上循环结构，特别是零次1-上循环的分类问题。这类问题与非交换几何、李代数上同调理论以及迹映射的构造密切相关，有助于理解这些代数结构的同调性质。
AI.method: 采用李代数上同调理论的方法，分析自由结合代数T(A_n)的导子李代数上的1-上循环。通过研究取值于循环词空间张量积的零次上循环，证明其在有限次商上的限制可以表示为非交换散度及其交换的线性组合。同时，研究自由李代数𝔏_{2n}的辛导子李代数上的类似结构。
AI.result: 主要结果有两个：1) 当n≥3时，自由结合代数T(A_n)的导子李代数上取值于|T(A_n)|⊗|T(A_n)|的零次1-上循环，在限制到有限次商时，可以表示为非交换散度及其交换的线性组合；2) 证明了自由李代数𝔏_{2n}的辛导子李代数上Enomoto-Satoh迹的唯一性。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功分类了自由结合代数导子李代数上的一类重要1-上循环，揭示了它们与非交换散度的紧密联系。同时，在自由李代数的辛导子情形下，证明了Enomoto-Satoh迹的唯一性，这些结果为非交换几何和李代数上同调理论提供了新的见解。

title: Relative braid group symmetries on modified iquantum groups and their modules
comment: v2 75 pages, some terminology changes and minor revisions
summary: We present a comprehensive generalization of Lusztig's braid group symmetries for quasi-split iquantum groups. Specifically, we give 3 explicit rank one formulas for symmetries acting on integrable modules over a quasi-split iquantum group of arbitrary Kac-Moody type with general parameters. These symmetries are formulated in terms of idivided powers and iweights of the vectors being acted upon. We show that these symmetries are consistent with the relative braid group symmetries on iquantum groups, and they are also related to Lusztig's symmetries via quasi $K$-matrices. Furthermore, through appropriate rescaling, we obtain compatible symmetries for the integral forms of modified iquantum groups and their integrable modules. We verify that these symmetries satisfy the relative braid group relations.

AI.tldr: 本文全面推广了Lusztig的辫子群对称性到拟分裂i量子群，给出了三个显式的秩一公式，建立了与相对辫子群对称性和Lusztig对称性的联系，并验证了辫子群关系。
AI.motivation: 推广Lusztig的辫子群对称性理论到拟分裂i量子群，建立更一般的对称性框架，为任意Kac-Moody类型的拟分裂i量子群提供统一的对称性描述。
AI.method: 给出了三个显式的秩一公式，用idivided powers和iweights描述对称性作用在可积模上；通过拟K-矩阵与Lusztig对称性建立联系；通过适当重标度获得修改i量子群及其可积模的兼容对称性。
AI.result: 成功构造了拟分裂i量子群的辫子群对称性，证明了这些对称性与相对辫子群对称性的一致性，验证了它们满足辫子群关系，并建立了与Lusztig对称性的联系。
AI.conclusion: 本文为拟分裂i量子群建立了完整的辫子群对称性理论，推广了Lusztig的经典结果，为相关代数结构的研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: The center of the asymptotic Hecke category and unipotent character sheaves
comment: V3: Final version to appear in Represent. Theory. We thank the anonymous referees for their many helpful comments which greatly improved the paper
summary:
In 2015, Lusztig [Bull. Inst. Math. Acad. Sin. (N.S.)10(2015), no.1, 1-72] showed that for a connected reductive group over an algebraic closure of a finite field the associated (geometric) Hecke category admits a truncation in a two-sided Kazhdan--Lusztig cell, making it a categorification of the asymptotic algebra (J-ring), and that the categorical center of this "asymptotic Hecke category" is equivalent to the category of unipotent character sheaves supported in the cell. Subsequently, Lusztig noted that an asymptotic Hecke category can be constructed for any finite Coxeter group using Soergel bimodules. Lusztig conjectured that the centers of these categories are modular tensor categories (which was then proven by Elias and Williamson) and that for non-crystallographic finite Coxeter groups the S-matrices coincide with the Fourier matrices that were constructed in the 1990s by Lusztig, Malle, and Broué--Malle. If the conjecture is true, the centers may be considered as categories of "unipotent character sheaves" for non-crystallographic finite Coxeter groups.
  In this paper, we show that the conjecture is true for dihedral groups and for some (we cannot resolve all) cells of H3 and H4. The key ingredient is the method of H-reduction and the identification of the (reduced) asymptotic Hecke category with known categories whose center is already known as well. We conclude by studying the asymptotic Hecke category and its center for some infinite Coxeter groups with a finite cell.

AI.tldr: 该论文验证了Lusztig关于非晶体有限Coxeter群的渐近Hecke范畴中心的猜想，针对二面体群以及H3和H4的某些胞给出了证明。
AI.motivation: Lusztig在2015年发现几何Hecke范畴可在Kazhdan-Lusztig胞上进行截断，形成渐近Hecke范畴，其中心等价于该胞上的单模特征层范畴。他进一步猜想对于非晶体有限Coxeter群，这些中心是模张量范畴，且S矩阵与1990年代构造的Fourier矩阵一致。本文旨在验证这一猜想。
AI.method: 采用H-约化方法，将（约化后的）渐近Hecke范畴与已知范畴进行等同，从而利用这些已知范畴的中心信息。特别针对二面体群以及H3和H4的某些胞进行了具体分析。
AI.result: 证明了Lusztig猜想对于二面体群成立，并且对于H3和H4的某些胞也成立（尽管未能解决所有胞）。对于具有有限胞的无限Coxeter群，也研究了其渐近Hecke范畴及其中心。
AI.conclusion: 通过H-约化方法，成功验证了Lusztig猜想在多个具体情形下的正确性，为将渐近Hecke范畴中心视为非晶体有限Coxeter群的"单模特征层"范畴提供了支持。
